overview:
Steven Levine has served as President of Mission Mobile since 2007. Mission Mobile, a division of Mission Communications, specializes in mobile communication and marketing solutions including long codes, short codes and mobile web development. Mr Levine is a founder and contributing editor to Mobile Marketing and Technology, a leading industry resource guide.

Mr Levine is also the founder of Mission ATM. Mission ATM provides ATM machines and services throughout Mexico. Current clients include one of the largest airport groups and hotel chains.
